subdisciplines.name: Molecular Genetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the molecular basis of genetics, including the structure and function of genes, genetic regulation, and DNA replication and repair.

subdisciplines.name: Population Genetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how genetic variation is distributed and changes within populations, including the effects of selection, migration, and genetic drift.

subdisciplines.name: Developmental Genetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how genes control the development of embryos and how mutations can give rise to developmental abnormalities.
